original_text: And the number of them that lapped, putting their hand to their mouth, were three hundred men: but all the rest of the people bowed down upon their knees to drink water.
korean_text: 손으로 움켜 입에 대고 핥는 자의 수는 삼백 명이요 그 외의 백성은 다 무릎을 꿇고 물을 마신지라

sentences.original_text: And the number of them that lapped
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 물을 핥아 마신 자들의 수는

sentences.original_text: putting their hand to their mouth
but all the rest of the people
